sentences: Minulla on paljon ongelmia taloudellisella eturivillani.
Hnelt ei ollut koskaan ollut ongelmia tienvarsilla.
Tm aiheuttaa monia ongelmia nuorille, jotka yrittvt pst alalle.
context: The word 'ongelmia' is a plural form of the Finnish word 'ongelma', which means problem or issue. It is commonly used to refer to difficulties or challenges that someone is facing.
